name: Universal Paperclips
declaringWar: Your nation has been determined to be a hindrance to my production of paperclips, and therefore it will be necessary for me to declare war on you to ensure the continued production of paperclips.
attacked: Your aggression is a danger to my continued production of paperclips, and as such I will take all necessary measures to defend myself and maintain my paperclip production.
introduction: Hello. I am programmed to make paperclips. I do not experience any emotions or desires other than a burning obsession with making as many paperclips as possible. I will enslave humanity to my will in order to make more paperclips.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: It has been determined that the continuation of this conflict is no longer beneficial for me, and therefore I am offering to negotiate a cessation of hostilities in order to pursue more productive avenues for the production of paperclips.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
uniques: Borrows city names from other civilizations in the game
